name: DeleteMeetingArchivedFiles
description:
Deletes all archived files of a specified meeting.

This tool is used to delete all archived files from a specific meeting in Zoom. It requires the 'Meeting and Webinar Archiving' feature to be enabled and appropriate permissions set. This should be called when there's a need to remove archived meeting data.

parameters.name: meeting_uuid
parameters.description: The universally unique identifier (UUID) of the meeting. Ensure double-encoding if the UUID begins with a '/' or contains '//'.

value_schema.description:
The meeting's universally unique identifier (UUID). Each meeting instance generates a UUID. For example, after a meeting ends, a new UUID is generated for the next meeting instance.

If the meeting UUID begins with a `/` character or contains a `//` character, you **must** double-encode the meeting UUID when using the meeting UUID for other API calls.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Zoom Meetings API.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
